title: How do you want to feel
excerpt: That might be the single best question for assessing how you want to go about your day.

children.text: That might be the single best question for assessing how you want to go about your day.
Are you doing things that bring you joy or equanimity? That youâ€™re proud of? That make you feel alive?
Knowing your intention beforehand is often a surefire way to bring about the outcome you seek.
